author: Special Correspondent
text:
Kalligudi police have arrested two persons from Bihar for robbing a woman of her gold chain, when she refused to give it for polishing, near Kalligudi on Monday.

The police said that two persons had approached Karthigaiselvi (23) of South Street in Maruthangudi around 2 p.m. They claimed that they would give glittering polish to silver and gold ornaments.

After giving her daughters silver anklets for polishing, the woman had removed her three-sovereign gold chain for polishing.

‘Polishing charges’

However, before handing it over to them, she had asked about the charges for polishing the gold chain.

When one of them said that it was Rs. 1,000, the woman who thought it was bit expensive, declined for polishing.

Suddenly, one of them assaulted the woman and snatched the chain. Before they could escape, the woman raised an alarm, and neighbours nabbed the duo. They were identified as P. Jayaprakash (38) and M. Munna Kumar (20) of Bihar.
title: Two from Bihar held for robbery
